because the best archive extractors are giving me these errors:

7-zip : Unsupported compression method.

WinRAR: The archive is corrupt.

WinZip: Error: Central directory not found.

In 99% of these cases it means that the archive contains incorrect headers.

Other ZIP programs can open some archives with incorrect headers,

since these programs just ignore errors. Thanks for this great upload anyway!

I don't want to say anything bad about this torrent,

used as download directory "the same directory" & checked all the files for many times (100%).
